Cross Arts can be activated once the CP Gauge is maxed.

Teaches Cross Art: Aura.
Effect: Moderately recovers HP of all allies. Applies {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_040)} Status
Abnormality Immunity and {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_041)} Stat Debuff Immunity.
{fc9Note: Select via the Cross Arts menu to use.}

Teaches Cross Art: High Field.
Effect: Greatly boosts all allies' stats for 3 turns and nullifies
physical/magic damage for 1 turn.

Teaches Cross Art: Break.
Effect: Deals minor damage to all enemies and moderately reduces
ATK/DEF/INT/SPI for 4 turns.
{fc9Note: Select via the Cross Arts menu to use.}

Boosts HP/SP by {d0} for each Agent Rank.
Boosts all stats by {d2} for each Agent Rank.

Boosts HP/SP by {d0} for each Agent Rank.
Boosts all stats by {d2} for each Agent Rank.

Boosts the damage of Cross Arts by {d0}% for each Agent Rank.

Teaches Cross Art: Revive.
Effect: Revives all allies from KO and slightly recovers HP.
Applies {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_042)} Guts (survive at 1 HP when taking fatal damage).
{fc9Note: Select via the Cross Arts menu to use.}
